source.description: URI that identifies the context in which an event happened.

type.description: The type of event related to the originating occurrence.

spec-version.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification which the event uses.

id.description: A string that identifies the event.

time.description: Timestamp of when the occurrence happened.

subject.description: The subject of the event in the context of the event producer.

data-schema.description: URI that identifies the schema the data adheres to.
